text: lma btlt hujatuhum wazahar alhaqu eadaluu 'iilaa aistiemal sltanhm, wqalu: harriqu 'iibrahim balnar; ghdbana lalhtkm 'iin kuntum naasirin lha. fashealu narana ezymt wa'alquh fyha, fantasir allah larasuluh waqal llnar: kuni brdana wslamana ealaa 'ibrahym, falam yanalh fiha adha, walam ysbh mkrwh
